docs: the sheets also seemed worn out .the bathroom was slightly larger than the previous room , but was well equipped and , again , very clean .our rooms were very spacious and clean but smelled of fresh paint which was a little bothersome .my room is clean but otherwise very cramped and dull , bathroom is also outdated and dingy looking .there were bugs in the bathroom . </DOC> rooms are clean and staff is friendly and accommodating .room had several maintenance issues .plugs on the lamps did not work .rooms are clean and staff is friendly .about 2:30 got a call the rooms were ready . </DOC> i had a room on the 3rd floor and woke up to ants crawling all over me .i quickly jumped in the shower andand it looks like from other review i am not the only one who had unexpected bugs in their room ! disgusting and unacceptable ! ! !
summary: the room was clean and the staff was very nice .this is a clean and comfortable .the fridge was clean and the beds were comfortable , had a large comfortable and a clean and comfortable bed .the room was very clean .</DOC><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad><pad>
